an5.208:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks of not using chew sticks.
an5.208:4.3: It’s not good for your eyes, you get bad breath, your taste-buds aren’t cleaned, bile and phlegm cover your food, and you lose your appetite.
an5.208:4.4: These are the five drawbacks of not using chew sticks.
an5.208:5.1: There are these five benefits of using chew sticks.
an5.208:5.3: It’s good for your eyes, you don’t get bad breath, your taste-buds are cleaned, bile and phlegm don’t cover your food, and food agrees with you.
an5.208:5.4: These are the five benefits of using chew sticks.”
